Texts.Chs: 一位作恶多端的电子人领主正在遥远的行星上压迫附近的人民，我应该铲除这个坏蛋。
Texts.Eng: A dread glitch warlord has been terrorising nearby planets from his tower on a far-off planet. I should do something about this.
Defeat the dread warlord of the Tower Invincible.

Texts.Chs: 哈哈！我终于知道自己到底有多强了，现在让我来看看到底有什么战利品！
Texts.Eng: Ha ha! A true test and proof of my stremf! Now time to help myself to all this sweet, sweet loot!
